_description: Property built 1971, renovated 2018. Special financing with accelerated amortization to 70% LTV in 5 years. Located in Engelberg, suitable for vacation rental investment.

_case_metadata.description: 1971 property, renovated 2018. 25% down, 1.8% fixed 10yr, accelerated amortization to 70% LTV in 5 years

financing._explanation: Engelbergerstrasse 53 financing terms: 25% down payment (235,000 CHF equity), 75% LTV loan (705,000 CHF), 1.8% fixed interest rate for 10 years. Special amortization requirement: must pay down to 70% LTV (658,000 CHF) within 5 years, requiring 47,000 CHF total amortization (9,400 CHF/year = 1.333% of initial loan).
financing._purchase_price_explanation: Purchase price for Engelbergerstrasse 53 property. Property was built in 1971 and renovated in 2018, making it suitable for vacation rental with modern amenities while maintaining character.
financing._ltv_explanation: 75% loan-to-value ratio means 25% down payment (235,000 CHF equity). Starting loan amount is 705,000 CHF. The loan must be amortized to 70% LTV (658,000 CHF) within 5 years, requiring 47,000 CHF total amortization.
financing._interest_rate_explanation: 1.8% annual interest rate, fixed for 10 years. This is higher than the base case (1.3%) but provides rate certainty for the first 10 years. After year 10, the loan will need to be refinanced at prevailing market rates.
financing._amortization_explanation: 1.333% annual amortization rate calculated to reduce loan from 705,000 CHF (75% LTV) to 658,000 CHF (70% LTV) in exactly 5 years. Annual amortization: 705,000 Ã— 0.01333 = 9,400 CHF/year. Total amortization over 5 years: 47,000 CHF. Monthly amortization: 783.33 CHF/month. This accelerated amortization improves equity position faster but increases monthly debt service compared to slower amortization schedules.
financing._num_owners_explanation: Four co-owners is the default assumption, matching the base case. This can be adjusted if the property will have a different ownership structure.
